rukus.text: 2|40|Ej Bani Isroil [farzandoni Ja'quʙ], ne'mathoero, ki ʙa sumo arzoni dostam, ʙa jod ovared va ʙa pajmone, ki ʙo man ʙastaed, vafo kuned, to Man niz ʙa pajmoni [xud ʙo] sumo [dar ʙorai ne'mathoi dunjo va oxirat] vafo kunam va tanho az man ʙitarsed
2|41|Va ʙa on ci nozil kardaam [Qur'on] imon ʙijovared, ki tasdiqkunandai cizest, ki ʙo sumost va naxustin kofir ʙa on naʙosed va ojoti maro ʙa ʙahoi nociz nafurused va tanho az Man ʙitarsed
2|42|Va, dar hole ki [haqiqatro] medoned, haqro ʙo ʙotil najomezed va onro kitmon [pinhon] nakuned
2|43|Va namoz ʙarpo dored va zakot ʙipardozed va ʙo namozguzoron namoz ʙixoned
2|44|Ojo, dar hole ki kitoʙi [Tavrot] – ro mexoned, mardumro ʙa neki farmon medihedu xudro faromus mekuned? Ojo nameandesed
2|45|Va az sikeʙoivu namoz jori cued; va ʙa rosti, ki on [namoz] cuz ʙa furutanon dusvoru garon ast
2|46|Hamon kasone, ki jaqin dorand, ki ʙa didori Parvardigori xes noil xohand sud va ʙa pesgohi U ʙozmegardand
